## Introducction

Provides R users with easy access to official cartographic data from Peru on a range of topics,
including society, transport, environment, agriculture, cadastral information, and climate.
It also includes data from regional government entities and technical-scientific institutions,
all managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru (IDEP).

<img src='man/figures/idesep.png' width='100%'/>


## Working with R

```{r setup}
library(geoidep)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Official Administrative Boundaries by INEI

```{r}
departaments <- get_departaments(show_progress = FALSE)
```

```{r}
names(departaments)
```


```{r}
# Display the first 10 rows of the data frame `departaments`
head(departaments)
```

## Simple Visualization

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = departaments) +
  theme_minimal()
```
